message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. I think it would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I can only commit to a maximum of $12,000. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be worth far more than $12,000 to you in the long run. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand your perspective, I still believe that $12,000 is the fair market value for this product. I would like to stick to that figure if possible.
